name: LD44 :: Angry Planet
description:
This was more like a 24h jam for me. Because off my two lovely children. And the lovely weather...
Therefore i couldn't finish quite a few wanted features (vulcanos as weapons e.g. :( ) but anyway...
I hope some off you will enjoy it for a few minutes. I'm looking forward to play your games!!

How:

  • Unity 2019
  • Hand drawn sprites via light table and scanner
  • Sfx via mic & garageband
  • Ambient Sounds via field recording
  • Music via Moog Sub37 & garageband
